title: Custom ERP System with Blazor Server
description: An in-house ERP system built with Blazor Server to replace MyFactory
details: A comprehensive ERP system developed with Blazor Server, featuring Active Directory integration and seamless compatibility with the existing MyFactory system.

title: Flutter Game of Life
description: Conway's Game of Life implemented in Flutter
details: An interactive implementation of Conway's Game of Life using Flutter, featuring a responsive UI and adjustable simulation speed.

title: HoloDraw - Bachelor's Thesis
description: VR drawing system combining 2D and 3D input methods
details: A VR drawing system that bridges the gap between free-form VR drawing and precise 2D input, developed as a Bachelor's thesis project.
